page.title: 14INDUSTRY & COMMERCE
page.content: There are two {Garden Centres}in the area. Both have sites bordering the A4 and both are at Hare Hatch. These are {Kennedy's} and { Ladds Ltd.} In a 230 year old property called Monks Mead House there are European Headquarters (offices) of{Fisher-Price toys. Hare Hatch again. {Vortice Ltd.}of Milley Lane Hare Hatch deal in fans and vacuum cleaners. Antique dealers {Biggs of Maidenhead } are at Hare Hatch Grange. A one time Water works building in Blakes Road, Wargrave, houses{ {Electrolube Ltd. { {Continental Awnings Ltd,} a two year old company, is at Kennedy's. The offices of a company manufacturing and selling steel bridges world wide{ {Mabey Holdings Ltd,}is at Floral Mile.
